lumis.service.activitystream

Interface IActivityStreamManagerSPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityStreamManager

    public interface IActivityStreamManagerSPI
    Service provider interface for the activity stream framework manager.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17049 $ $Date: 2015-03-03 11:26:53 -0300 (Tue, 03 Mar 2015) $

      • getRecentActivities

        List<Activity> getRecentActivities(String activityStreamServiceInstanceId,
                                   Long beforeTimeMillis,
                                   int maxResults)
                            throws PortalException
        Returns a list of activities, ordered by descending creation time.

        If the user does not have view permission in the specified activityStreamServiceInstanceId, this method returns an empty list.

        The permissions of the current user affects the activities returned by this method.

        An activity is included in the list returned if all the following conditions apply:

        • the user has view permission in the activity's origin service instance.
        • the user has view permission in the activity's activity stream service instance.
        • the activity's activity stream service instance has an area tag in common with the specified activity stream service instance.
        • the activity was created before the specified beforeTimeMillis, if it is not null.
        • the maxResults specified was not reached.
        Parameters:
        activityStreamServiceInstanceId - the identifier of the activity stream service instance to use as base for generating the result.
        beforeTimeMillis - only consider activities created before this value. If null it is ignored.
        maxResults - maximum number of activities to return.
        Returns:
        a list of activities ordered by their creation date, most recent first.
        Throws:
        PortalException
        Since:
        8.0.0
